name: Stratus Ventures
overview: Stratus Ventures is a venture capital firm specializing in early stage, series A and series B financings. The firm seeks to invest in technology, business services, and retail industries. In information technology, it focuses on application software, infrastructure software, and technology enabled services. The firm seeks to invest between $2 million to $3 million initially and a total investment of up to $5 million. It prefers to invest in equity. The firm prefers to be the lead investor and seeks a board seat in its portfolio companies. Stratus Ventures was founded in 2006 and is based in Northbrook, Illinois.
